verbs.description: hsbc [V: is] making a 130 million investment in its bank branches and the latest step is to arm its bankers with samsung watches hsbc has asked bankers in one of its branches to wear special samsung watches so that they can better communicate with each other and improve efficiency jeremy balkin samsung hsbc 130 million bank
